name: Vust:Nexus
description:
I spent the last 3 months learning more and more about the Rust programming language and came up with this project for one of my university courses. I tried to create a more complex, well structured and scaleable project then my previous one. 

In this project I wrote a lot of systems Ive never did before such as a sprite sheet animation and state based animation controller system or a png based level builder. I also had my hands on creating a new and better particle system then in my previous one and I really think it shows off what ive learned so far.    

So hope you enjoy this little game ^_^

I will update this project with more content from time to time but first I need a day off xD
